content.text: The text editor is built on TipTap (ProseMirror) and supports rich formatting, real-time collaboration, and version history.

content.caption: The TipTap editor with formatting toolbar, tables, and live collaboration cursors.

content.text: The toolbar at the top of the editor provides formatting controls:

items: Text style — Bold, Italic, Underline, Strikethrough.
Lists — Bullet lists, numbered lists, and task/checkbox lists.
Block types — Code blocks, blockquotes, horizontal rules.

content.text: On mobile devices (screens ≤768px), a compact formatting toolbar appears at the bottom of the screen, fixed just above the virtual keyboard. It provides quick access to Bold, Italic, Strikethrough, Headings (H1–H3), Bullet and Numbered lists, Blockquote, Code, Undo, and Redo — all optimized for touch.
The mobile toolbar automatically repositions when the virtual keyboard opens, so formatting controls are always accessible while typing.
Select text to reveal a floating toolbar with quick formatting options. This provides fast access to bold, italic, link, highlight, and other actions without moving to the main toolbar.
Insert tables from the toolbar. Once inserted, you can add/remove rows and columns, merge cells, and set header rows. Use Tab to navigate between cells.
The editor automatically saves as you type. Collaborators see your changes in real-time with colored cursors showing who is editing where.
